House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00099
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EXPANDING THE GROUNDS FOR LEGAL SEPARATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ARTICLE 55 OF THE FAMILY CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Considers not only the number of time violence is perpetrated but also the severity or gravity of the violence committed, and; considers additional grounds related and equated to the previously considered marriage offenses.
